com.google.gwt.core.ext.soyc.impl
Class SizeMapRecorder

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.core.ext.soyc.impl.SizeMapRecorder

public class SizeMapRecorder
extends java.lang.Object

Records an array of SizeBreakdown to a gzipped XML file. That file is then read to produce a Story of Your Compile.

escapeXml

public static void escapeXml(java.lang.String code,
                             int start,
                             int end,
                             boolean quoteApostrophe,
                             java.lang.StringBuilder builder)
Escapes '&', '<', '>', '"', and optionally ''' to their XML entity equivalents. The portion of the input string between start (inclusive) and end (exclusive) is scanned. The output is appended to the given StringBuilder.

Parameters:
code - the input String
start - the first character position to scan.
end - the character position following the last character to scan.
quoteApostrophe - if true, the ' character is quoted as &apos;
builder - a StringBuilder to be appended with the output.

recordMap

                             java.io.OutputStream out,

                      throws java.io.IOException
Parameters:
logger - a TreeLogger
Throws:
java.io.IOException
